title: Patient ResourcesIntegrative Care
description: Our pediatric integrative therapies for hospitalized patients include massage therapy, healing touch, reflexology, guided imagery, Reiki and acupressure.
cleaned_text: Integrative healthcare combines conventional medicine with evidence-informed, therapeutic and lifestyle practices that promote comfort, healing, and wellbeing, using a whole person perspective. Cincinnati Children's is home to one of the country's largest and most experienced pediatric integrative care teams. This team partners with inpatient medical teams to go beyond traditional treatments in caring for the whole person - body, mind, spirit. The approaches they use are based on research and can help to manage symptoms, including: - Pain - Anxiety - Nausea - Stress - Difficulty sleeping - Fatigue
